org.openimaj.audio.filters

Class HanningAudioProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.audio.Audio
      • org.openimaj.audio.AudioStream
        • org.openimaj.audio.processor.AudioProcessor
          • org.openimaj.audio.processor.FixedSizeSampleAudioProcessor
            • org.openimaj.audio.filters.WeightedWindowedAudioProcessor
              • org.openimaj.audio.filters.HanningAudioProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<SampleChunk>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HammingAudioProcessor

    public class HanningAudioProcessor
extends WeightedWindowedAudioProcessor
    Applies a Hanning window on top of the audio signal.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    "http://cnx.org/content/m0505/latest/"
